  • Method Details

    • displayImage

      void displayImage​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Controller method to change image of donut depending on selected type of donut.
      Parameters:
      event - of action

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initialize certain references which are needed to be instanciated once the controller is created. Create, initialize, and set properties of donutType, flavor, donutOrder, and donutNum.

    • ctrl_addDonut

      public void ctrl_addDonut​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Controller method to add the donut object to the current temporary basket. Also change subtotal respectively, after adding the donut in.
      Parameters:
      event - of action

    • convertToType

      private int convertToType()
      Helper method to get type of donut, converting to int
      Returns:
      int, code of type of donut.

    • convertToAddIn

      private Donut_flavor convertToAddIn()
      Helper method to get Donut_flavor enum, converting to enum
      Returns:
      flavor of the Donut

    • ctrl_removeDonut

      public void ctrl_removeDonut​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Controller class to remove selected donut by selected number of donuts. Also change subtotal according to change of the donut's number.
      Parameters:
      event - of action

    • getSelectedDonutFromStr

      private Donut getSelectedDonutFromStr​(String selectedDonut_str)
      Helper method to find and get donut object from the string of selected donut in GUI
      Parameters:
      selectedDonut_str - String of selected donut in GUI
      Returns:
      corresponded donut object

    • ctrl_addToOrder

      void ctrl_addToOrder​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Controller method to add the donut object to currentOrder's itemList
      Parameters:
      event - of action

    • subTotalLiveUpdate

      public void subTotalLiveUpdate()
      Controller method to change subtotal according to the current donuts.

    • setMainController

      public void setMainController​(MainViewController controller)
      Data communicating helper method. Enable this controller class to reach to the DB
      Parameters:
      controller -
